387:5: nāsti kulaputra īdṛśaṃ pratibhānaṃ tathāgatānāmapi yādṛśamāryāvalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ||
387:7: bhagavānāha–bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra vipaśyī nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
387:8: tena kālena tena samayenāhaṃ sarvanīvaraṇaniṣkambhin sugandhamukho nāma vaṇikputro'bhūvam |
387:9: tadā me śrutā vipaśyinastathāgatasya sakāśādāryāvalokiteśvarasya guṇodbhāvanā ||
387:10: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat– kīdṛśī tvayā bhagavan guṇodbhāvanā śrutā ?
387:13: yādṛśī tvayā bhagavan guṇodbhāvanā āryāvalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śrutā ||
387:23: athāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo maheśvaraṃ devaputrametadavocat–bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ maheśvaraḥ kaliyuge pratipanne |
387:29: īdṛśaṃ mayā kulaputra vipaśyinastathāgatasya sakāśādāryāvalokiteśvarasya guṇodbhāvanā śrutā ||
387:30: tadapyatikramya śikhī nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho babhūva vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
387:31: tena kālena tena samayenāhaṃ sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin dānaśūro nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'bhūvam |
387:32: tasya śikhinastathāgatasya sakāśādavalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsatvasya guṇodbhāvanā śrutā ||
